item.title: Rebirth of the Excellent Daughter of the Marquis Household (REDMH)
item.description:
Gu Yu Qi, a daughter born to a marquis household. She was beautiful with knowledge in both civil and military, and her kindness broader than the sky. It was love at first sight for her, and she insisted on marrying him and was happy even if she were to become a mistress. She worked hard to help him step by step to become the emperor.

But what happened to her in the end?

For ten whole years, she was humiliated and abandoned. Disheartened, she drank poison to end her life and set her place on fire, only to find herself back to when she was ten years old. It was the year she followed her mother into the capital. It wasnâ€™t too late to change her fate.

If Yun Ke had any regrets in his previous life, then it would be how he always kept thinking about a woman who died decades ago. Because of that, before he died, he secretly had the womanâ€™s ashes pressed beneath his coffin. As the emperor, he had the final say of everything under the sky. So how could he allow that woman to be arrogant in front of him? Even at his deathbed, he would crush her beneath him.

Who knew heâ€™d be reborn againâ€¦

When the transmigrated girl meets the boy who was reborn, Gu Yu Qi simply wanted to yell at the sky. Just what are you playing at!?

item.title: After Rebirth, I Married my Archenemy
item.volume: Volume 2: A Blade Drawn on the Bowstring
item.description:
Before her death, Qun Qing hated the powerful official Lu Huating the most. She hated him for assisting the new emperor and for being cunning and insidious. She thought about him day and night, and tried her best to defeat him, but she was not his match. In the end, she became a cannon fodder in his hands.

After Qun Qing died, she saw the princess of the fallen country that she had protected with her life, crying and leaning on the new emperorâ€™s chest: â€œQung Qing is dead, what should I do?â€
The new emperor kissed her: â€œYou will be fine, just love me.â€
The princess burst into tears, like a delicate flower under the rain: â€œQung Qing is dead, Your Majesty is all I have left.â€

When she opened his eyes, Qun Qing had woke up three years ago. She stood up, woodenly packed her bags, and regardless of the princessâ€™s obstruction, took off her jade crown and walked away, dropped her female officialâ€™s wooden seal, turned around and left, leaving behind ten years of careful planning and treading on thin ice.

Restore the country? Pfft, restore it my foot.
â€”â€”

The powerful minister Lu Huating is deeply cunning, ruthless, and dominates the power struggles of the court. Tired of the ugly nature of human hearts, his life has become dull and unfulfilling.

Looking back on his life, the only thing that left an impression was a female officer, a spy, whom he poisoned to death at the age of twenty-six.

For the love of the princess, she sacrificed his life for the country and schemed against him several times. In the end, she knelt in front of the Summer Palace, her facial expression remaining unchanged, with a look of resentment in her eyes, and sighed with a smile, â€œThe king who wins is the ruler, and the one who loses is the defeated,â€ before raising her head and drinking to the last drop. Bl00d poured from her lips, a thin layer of vivid red.

When he opened his eyes again, Lu Huating returned to his twenty-three-year-old self.

Lu Huating looked at the documents under his command, and felt even more bored. He put down his brush and leaned on the back of the chair: â€œWhere is the female official accompanying Crown Princess?â€

â€œâ€¦ She resigned. She asked me to tell My lord that she would not fight anymore.â€

Lu Huating was silent for a while, and curled his lips coldly: â€œShe said she wonâ€™t fight, so the fight is over?â€

item.title: Giving Interstellar Players a Horror Ghost Game Shock
item.description:
Ye Yuxi has lived in the interstellar world for 20 years and has just remembered that she is a proud transmigrator. Before her transmigration, she was an avid fan of horror games; after transmigrating, she coincidentally became a university student majoring in game design. In this interstellar world, where everyone is a tough, bloodthirsty warrior, violent and gory games are all the rageâ€”most notably, games about hunting insectoid aliens and zombies. A search across the star network reveals no concept of supernatural horror games at all!

What does this mean? It means there is a vast untapped blue ocean of opportunity!

With this in mind, Ye Yuxi rolls up her sleeves and decides to give the interstellar residents a little shock with horror female ghost!

She launches Campus Nightmare, and interstellar players are terrified: â€œIâ€™ve never been this scared of school!â€

She releases Residential Area Battle Royale, and interstellar players cry: â€œThis isnâ€™t the battle royale Iâ€™ve played before!â€

She rolls out A Loving Home, and interstellar players go crazy: â€œWhereâ€™s my quilt barrier? Is there any safe place in this world?!â€

Later, after receiving the 10,086th complaint message from a terrified player, Ye Yuxi calmly accepts an interview: â€œAt first, I just wanted to make a small game Iâ€™d enjoy. I never expected it to be so popular, so I ended up making a few moreâ€¦â€

item.title: The White Moonlight Disdained by the Male Protagonist of Redemption
item.description:
Ning Yao died tragically.
 The man she had saved and cared for for many years despised her and shattered her spirit veins with his own hands and dissolved her body.
Ning Yao: â€œThank you. I have waited for this day.â€
Ning Yao is from the ancient Bodhi clan, kind by nature but without a heart.
 One year, she rescued a demon from the hands of the immortal Xuanmen, who was tortured and dying. She took good care of him, curing his years of illness and scars.
 She did not mind his humble status and liked him wholeheartedly, always smiling, hugging, and kissing him.
 Every time at that moment, Feng Jingzhuo felt pity and helplessness, and his love deepened.
 Little Bodhi (Ning Yao) cured his disabled and ugly body and cured his inferiority, self-loathing, sensitivity, and paranoia.
 How could he not be infatuated and loyal and love her deeply?
 But what Feng Jingzhuo did not know was that according to the rules of the Bodhi clanâ€™s ascension, one must first save others to prove the truth and then die and be reborn before ascending.
 And Ning Yaoâ€™s lifelong wish is to ascend.
That year, the eldest sister failed to ascend to heaven, and before she and her brother-in-law retired to the world sweetly, she pointed out a clear path for Ning Yao:

â€œYao Yao, our Bodhi clan is too beloved. Who could bear to use us as a stepping stone for enlightenment?â€

â€œIf youâ€™re truly set on it, why not try that demon imprisoned by the immortal sect? Pfftâ€”those fools donâ€™t know his worth. Heâ€™s from the Cangyuan Dragon Clan.â€

â€œIf it works, great. If notâ€¦ well, you could always fall in love, just like I did.â€

Her elder sister revealed a secret about the Cangyuan Dragon Clan:

If they fall deeply enough in love, their hearts will grow scales to shield them from their emotions. When that happens, their instincts will turn against their beloved, giving rise to an uncontrollable urge to kill.

Slay oneâ€™s beloved, attain enlightenment, ascend immediately, and forget the past.

A perfect outcome for both.

Ning Yao knew that Feng Jingzhuo had already begun to grow his heartâ€™s scales.

Yet, he endured the agonizing pain, hiding away to claw open his own chest. He ripped out the endlessly growing scales, pinned his own hands down with bone nailsâ€”desperately resisting his dragon instincts.

â€œYao Yao, donâ€™t come inâ€¦â€

â€œI beg youâ€¦ whatever you do, donâ€™t come inâ€¦â€

â€œItâ€™ll be over soon. Be good. Stay outsideâ€¦â€

Outside, Ning Yao pondered, if we can both ascend, thatâ€™s better than neither of us ascending at all.

So, she went in.

Just as she always did, she held him in her arms, kissing his trembling, pale lips with tenderness.

After many 10 thousand years, Ning Yao was reborn and successfully ascended.

She forgot Feng Jingzhou, but he remembered her.

Tormenting himself, he wanted to turn back time.

Ning Yao was very happy, but the ceremony of conferring the gods was a little simple.

Because the entire world of gods was busy trying to stop a fallen god who wants to activate the forbidden Time-Reversal Array.

Theme: My heart is controlled by me, not by heavens.
